description: Creating hour-by-hour schedules balancing work, wellness, and personal goals

quick_plan.question: Which day are we planning for?
quick_plan.why_matters: Determines if it's a workday, weekend, or special day

quick_plan.question: Do you have any fixed appointments or commitments that day?
quick_plan.why_matters: Anchors the schedule around non-negotiable items

quick_plan.question: What are your top 3 priorities for this day?
quick_plan.why_matters: Ensures important tasks get scheduled during peak energy times

quick_plan.question: What wellness activities do you want to include? (exercise, meditation, meals, etc.)
quick_plan.why_matters: Ensures self-care is built into the schedule

quick_plan.question: What time do you usually wake up and go to bed?
quick_plan.why_matters: Defines the boundaries of your day
